templates.name: Patient Intake & Scheduling Agent
templates.description: Automates patient intake, appointment coordination, and reminders to reduce no-shows
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces no-show rates by 30% and administrative burden by 60%

userStories: As a patient, I want to schedule appointments online 24/7 without waiting on hold
As a clinic staff member, I want patient forms completed before arrival to reduce wait times
As a healthcare provider, I want automated reminders to reduce no-show rates
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Deploy an intelligent scheduling agent that integrates with existing EHR systems to automate patient intake and reduce administrative burden.

templates.name: Prior Authorization Agent
templates.description: Speeds up approvals and reduces manual payer interactions
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces authorization processing time by 75% and improves approval rates by 40%

userStories: As a healthcare provider, I want prior authorizations processed automatically to reduce delays in patient care
As a billing specialist, I want real-time status updates on authorization requests
As a patient, I want faster approval for necessary treatments
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Implement an intelligent agent that automates the prior authorization process by integrating with payer systems and using AI to gather required documentation.

templates.name: Asset Maintenance Forecast Agent
templates.description: Predicts equipment failure and schedules proactive maintenance
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces unplanned downtime by 45% and maintenance costs by 30%

userStories: As a maintenance manager, I want to predict equipment failures before they occur
As a field technician, I want optimized maintenance schedules to reduce travel time
As an operations director, I want to minimize unplanned downtime
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Deploy predictive analytics on IoT sensor data to forecast equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.

templates.name: Supplier Risk Monitoring Agent
templates.description: Detects supply chain risks and recommends mitigation actions
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces supply chain disruptions by 60% and improves supplier performance by 35%

userStories: As a procurement manager, I want early warnings about supplier risks
As a supply chain analyst, I want automated risk assessments for all suppliers
As an executive, I want visibility into supply chain vulnerabilities
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Implement continuous monitoring of suppliers using AI to analyze multiple risk factors and provide actionable insights.

templates.name: Competitive Intel Agent
templates.description: Pulls news, pricing updates, and feature releases of competitors
templates.businessBenefit: Improves win rates by 25% and reduces competitive analysis time by 80%

userStories: As a sales rep, I want real-time competitive insights during customer conversations
As a product manager, I want to track competitor feature releases
As a sales leader, I want to understand why we win or lose deals
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Deploy automated monitoring of competitor activities with AI-powered analysis to provide actionable sales intelligence.

templates.name: Contract Risk Review Agent
templates.description: Reviews contracts for risk clauses and compliance gaps
templates.shortDescription: AI-powered contract analysis and risk assessment
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces contract review time by 70% and identifies 95% more risk factors

userStories: As a legal professional, I want automated identification of risky contract clauses
As a business manager, I want faster contract turnaround times
As a compliance officer, I want assurance that contracts meet our standards
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Leverage AI to automatically review contracts, identify risks, and ensure compliance with organizational standards.

templates.name: Inventory Visibility Agent
templates.description: Gives store associates and customers real-time inventory across channels
templates.businessBenefit: Increases sales conversion by 20% and reduces stockouts by 50%

userStories: As a customer, I want to know if an item is in stock before visiting the store
As a store associate, I want to help customers find products across all locations
As a manager, I want to reduce lost sales due to stockouts
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Create a unified inventory visibility layer that provides real-time stock information across all channels.

templates.name: Fraud Detection & Alert Agent
templates.description: Monitors transactions and behaviors to flag and alert suspicious activity in real-time
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces fraud losses by 65% and improves detection accuracy by 85%

userStories: As a fraud analyst, I want real-time alerts on suspicious transactions
As a customer, I want protection from fraudulent activity on my accounts
As a risk manager, I want to reduce false positives while catching real fraud
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Implement real-time fraud detection using machine learning models that analyze transaction patterns and customer behavior.

templates.name: Citizen Service Request Agent
templates.description: Enables 24/7 intake and routing of non-emergency issues (e.g., potholes, permits)
templates.businessBenefit: Improves citizen satisfaction by 40% and reduces response time by 60%

userStories: As a citizen, I want to report issues 24/7 without waiting on hold
As a city employee, I want requests automatically routed to the right department
As a manager, I want visibility into service request trends
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Deploy an omnichannel bot that handles citizen service requests, automatically categorizes and routes them to appropriate departments.

templates.name: Regulatory Compliance Agent
templates.description: Monitors and reports compliance with federal standards (e.g., FedRAMP, NIST)
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces compliance audit time by 75% and improves accuracy by 90%

userStories: As a compliance officer, I want continuous monitoring of our security controls
As an auditor, I want automated evidence collection for compliance reviews
As a CISO, I want real-time visibility into our compliance posture
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Implement continuous compliance monitoring with automated evidence collection and reporting for federal standards.

templates.name: Copilot for Sales Voice Agent
templates.description: AI-powered sales assistant with voice capabilities, conversation memory management, and multi-agent orchestration for comprehensive sales support
templates.shortDescription: Voice-enabled sales agent with memory and multi-agent orchestration
templates.businessBenefit: Increases sales productivity by 40% and improves CRM data quality by 90%
features: Voice-enabled conversational interface with speech recognition and synthesis
Multi-agent orchestration for complex sales tasks
Persistent conversation memory with GUID-based user tracking
Integration with Dynamics 365 for CRM operations
Real-time Hacker News feed for market intelligence
Context-aware memory management for personalized interactions
Time machine feature for conversation replay and analysis

agents.name: HackerNewsAgent
agents.purpose: Fetches latest tech news for market insights

userStories: As a sales representative, I want to update CRM records using voice commands while driving between meetings
As a sales manager, I want my team to access customer insights through natural conversation
As a field sales rep, I want to retrieve product information and pricing through voice queries
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Deploy a voice-enabled AI assistant that allows sales teams to interact with CRM data, access market intelligence, and manage customer relationships through natural language conversations, with persistent memory for personalized interactions

customFields.name: voiceInterfaceDesign
customFields.label: Voice Interface Design
customFields.placeholder: Describe voice interaction patterns, wake words, and conversation flow

customFields.name: memoryRetentionPolicy
customFields.label: Memory Retention Policy
customFields.placeholder: Define how long conversations are retained and memory management rules

customFields.name: agentOrchestration
customFields.label: Multi-Agent Orchestration Strategy
customFields.placeholder: Describe how multiple agents work together for complex tasks

templates.name: Microsoft 365 Researcher Agent
templates.description: Out-of-the-box AI reasoning agent that performs deep research across enterprise data and web sources, employing a three-phase approach: Planning, Iterative Research, and Synthesis. Built on OpenAI's o3 deep research model with 88.5% higher accuracy than standard Copilot Chat.
templates.shortDescription: OOTB deep research agent with enterprise data integration
templates.businessBenefit: Saves 6-8 hours per week on research tasks with 88.5% higher accuracy
features: Deep research across internal and external sources
88.5% higher accuracy than standard Copilot Chat
Averages 10.1 sources per response with detailed citations
Clarifying question prompts for scope refinement
Professional report generation with actionable recommendations
Integration with emails, meetings, documents, and third-party apps

userStories: As a product manager, I want to research market trends across internal data and external sources to make informed product decisions
As an executive, I want comprehensive research reports that synthesize information from emails, documents, and web sources
As a business analyst, I want to quickly gather insights from across our organization's knowledge base
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Leverage the pre-built Researcher agent to enable employees across the organization to perform deep, accurate research that combines internal organizational knowledge with external sources, saving 6-8 hours per week on research tasks

templates.name: Microsoft 365 Analyst Agent
templates.description: Out-of-the-box data analysis agent running on OpenAI's o3-mini model, executing Python code in real-time with visible code execution. Handles messy real-world data across Excel, CSV, JSON, PowerPoint, and PDF formats with automatic error recovery.
templates.shortDescription: OOTB data analyst with Python execution and multi-format support
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces data analysis time by 90% with 82% accuracy improvement
features: Real-time Python code execution with visible output
Multi-format data handling (Excel, CSV, JSON, PowerPoint, PDF)
Automatic error recovery and data cleaning

skills: Basic understanding of data analysis concepts

userStories: As a business analyst, I want to analyze sales data across multiple Excel files to identify trends and patterns
As a finance manager, I want to create revenue projections from historical data with visible calculation methods
As a marketing director, I want to analyze customer behavior patterns from CSV exports without manual data cleaning
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Leverage the pre-built Analyst agent to democratize data analysis across the organization, enabling any employee to perform sophisticated analyses on messy real-world data without coding skills

templates.name: Dynamics 365 Sales Research Agent
templates.description: Microsoft's most sophisticated sales intelligence offering, available through the AI Accelerator for Sales program. Transforms natural language queries into comprehensive business intelligence through deep research capabilities with AI Cursor technology and multibranch research journeys.
templates.shortDescription: Advanced sales intelligence with AI-driven research and insights
templates.businessBenefit: Increases revenue per head by 133% and improves pipeline generation by 20%
features: AI Cursor technology for context-aware interactions
Multibranch research journeys for complex analysis
Natural language to business intelligence transformation
Integration with Dynamics 365 and external data sources
Excel and PDF file analysis capabilities

systems: AI Accelerator for Sales program enrollment

userStories: As a sales manager, I want to analyze territory performance and identify growth opportunities through AI-driven insights
As an account executive, I want to research prospect companies and understand their business challenges before meetings
As a sales operations leader, I want to forecast revenue with AI-powered analysis of pipeline and historical data
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Transform sales operations through AI-driven research capabilities that provide deep customer insights, market intelligence, and predictive analytics, enabling data-driven decision making at scale

templates.name: Email Intelligence Agent
templates.description: Automatically categorizes, prioritizes, and routes emails using AI to improve response times and customer satisfaction. Includes sentiment analysis and smart routing capabilities.
templates.shortDescription: Smart email categorization and routing with AI
templates.businessBenefit: Improves response time by 65% and customer satisfaction by 40%
features: Priority detection based on content and sender

systems: Exchange Online or compatible email system

userStories: As a customer service manager, I want emails automatically categorized so agents focus on high-priority issues
As a customer, I want my urgent emails routed quickly to the right department
As an agent, I want to see email sentiment and suggested responses to handle cases efficiently
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Implement AI-driven email processing to automatically categorize, prioritize, and route customer emails, reducing response times by 65% and improving customer satisfaction through intelligent automation

templates.name: Document Intelligence Agent
templates.description: Extract and process information from documents using AI, reducing manual data entry and improving accuracy. Handles forms, invoices, contracts, and unstructured documents.
templates.shortDescription: AI-powered document data extraction and processing
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces processing time by 90% and data entry costs by 80%

userStories: As a finance clerk, I want invoice data automatically extracted so I can process payments faster
As a compliance officer, I want contracts analyzed for key clauses to ensure regulatory compliance
As an operations manager, I want document processing automated to reduce errors and costs
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Implement end-to-end document processing automation using AI to extract data from various document types, validate against business rules, and integrate with downstream systems, reducing processing time by 90%

templates.name: Financial Insights Agent (Copilot Studio)
templates.description: Pre-built Copilot Studio template for financial services professionals. Analyzes SEC filings, generates regulatory reports, and provides market insights with code interpreter capabilities.
templates.shortDescription: Financial analysis agent with SEC filing and regulatory reporting
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces analysis time by 80% and improves compliance accuracy to 99.5%
features: Python code execution for custom analysis

userStories: As a financial analyst, I want to quickly analyze SEC filings to extract key metrics and trends
As a compliance officer, I want automated checking of regulatory requirements across financial reports
As an investment manager, I want to compare multiple companies' financial performance using AI
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Deploy a specialized financial analysis agent that combines pre-built capabilities with custom configurations to automate SEC filing analysis, regulatory compliance, and financial reporting, reducing analysis time by 80%

templates.name: Meeting Intelligence Agent
templates.description: Automatically prepares comprehensive meeting briefings by gathering and synthesizing information from multiple internal systems including CRM, project data, and communication history.
templates.shortDescription: AI-powered meeting preparation and insights generator
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces meeting preparation time by 75% and improves meeting effectiveness by 40%

userStories: As an executive, I want comprehensive briefings before meetings without manual preparation
As a project manager, I want all relevant project data aggregated before client meetings
As a sales person, I want customer history and insights compiled before sales calls
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Create an intelligent system that automatically prepares comprehensive meeting briefings by aggregating data from multiple sources, saving hours of preparation time and improving meeting effectiveness

templates.name: Smart Case Summarization Agent
templates.description: Automatically generates case summaries and suggests tags/categories for customer service cases using Gen AI, reducing manual effort and improving consistency.
templates.shortDescription: AI case summarization and intelligent tagging
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces case handling time by 30% and improves routing accuracy by 85%

userStories: As a service agent, I want automatic case summaries so I can quickly understand issues
As a supervisor, I want consistent tagging so I can analyze case trends
As a customer, I want my issue routed correctly the first time
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Leverage Gen AI to automatically analyze customer cases, generate concise summaries, and apply intelligent tags and categories, improving case handling efficiency by 30% and routing accuracy by 85%

templates.name: Self-Service Order Bot
templates.description: Customer-facing chatbot for order status inquiries, reducing support ticket volume through 24/7 self-service capabilities.
templates.shortDescription: Self-service order tracking and status chatbot
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces support tickets by 70% while improving customer satisfaction
features: Order lookup by number or email

systems: Copilot Studio or Azure Bot Service

userStories: As a customer, I want to check my order status instantly without waiting for support
As a customer, I want to initiate returns easily through self-service
As a support agent, I want routine inquiries handled automatically
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Deploy a self-service chatbot that handles order inquiries 24/7, reducing support tickets by 70% while improving customer satisfaction through instant responses

templates.name: Production Line Optimization Agent
templates.description: Analyzes production output and suggests improvements in real-time
templates.businessBenefit: Increases production efficiency by 25% and reduces defects by 40%

userStories: As a production manager, I want real-time insights to optimize line performance
As a quality engineer, I want to predict and prevent defects
As an operator, I want alerts about potential issues
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Deploy edge AI to analyze production data in real-time and provide actionable optimization recommendations.

templates.name: Personalized Marketing Agent
templates.description: Builds targeted campaigns from customer behavior and preferences
templates.businessBenefit: Increases conversion rates by 35% and customer engagement by 50%

userStories: As a marketer, I want AI to create personalized campaigns automatically
As a customer, I want relevant offers based on my preferences
As a CMO, I want improved campaign ROI through personalization
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Use AI to analyze customer data and automatically create personalized marketing campaigns across channels.

templates.name: Workforce Clearance & Onboarding Agent
templates.description: Streamlines federal employee background checks, training, and provisioning
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces onboarding time by 60% and ensures 100% compliance

userStories: As an HR specialist, I want automated tracking of clearance processes
As a new employee, I want streamlined onboarding with clear next steps
As a manager, I want visibility into onboarding status
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Implement secure, compliant onboarding automation for federal workforce with integrated clearance and training management.

templates.name: Clinical Notes Summarizer
templates.description: Generates real-time summaries from provider-patient conversations
templates.businessBenefit: Saves 2 hours per provider daily and improves documentation accuracy by 85%

userStories: As a physician, I want automated note generation from patient conversations
As a nurse, I want accurate documentation without extensive typing
As a patient, I want my provider focused on me, not the computer
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Deploy AI-powered clinical documentation that captures provider-patient conversations and generates accurate clinical notes in real-time.

templates.name: Emission Tracking Agent
templates.description: Tracks, analyzes, and reports emissions across facilities
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces compliance reporting time by 80% and improves accuracy to 99%

userStories: As an environmental manager, I want real-time emissions tracking across all facilities
As a compliance officer, I want automated regulatory reporting
As an executive, I want visibility into our carbon footprint
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Implement IoT-based emissions monitoring with AI analytics for real-time tracking and automated compliance reporting.

templates.name: Grants Management Agent
templates.description: Automates intake, scoring, and tracking of state-level grants
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces grant processing time by 70% and improves transparency

userStories: As a grant applicant, I want a simple online application process
As a grants officer, I want automated scoring and evaluation
As an administrator, I want real-time visibility into grant status
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Digitize and automate the entire grants lifecycle from application to performance monitoring with AI-powered evaluation.

templates.name: Store Associate Copilot
templates.description: Assists in-store staff with product info, promos, and customer service
templates.shortDescription: AI assistant for retail store associates
templates.businessBenefit: Improves sales conversion by 20% and reduces training time by 50%

userStories: As a store associate, I want instant access to product information
As a customer, I want knowledgeable staff who can answer my questions
As a store manager, I want my team to have the tools they need to succeed
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Empower store associates with an AI assistant that provides instant access to product, inventory, and customer information.

templates.name: Loan Origination Assistant
templates.description: Streamlines application intake, documentation checks, and initial credit assessment
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces loan processing time by 65% and improves approval rates by 30%

userStories: As a loan applicant, I want a fast and simple application process
As a loan officer, I want automated document verification and risk assessment
As a manager, I want consistent underwriting decisions
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Automate loan origination workflow with AI-powered document processing, risk assessment, and decision support.

templates.name: Resource Utilization Agent
templates.description: Matches available staff to projects based on skills and availability
templates.businessBenefit: Improves utilization rates by 25% and reduces bench time by 40%

userStories: As a resource manager, I want AI to match the right people to projects
As a consultant, I want to be assigned to projects that match my skills
As a partner, I want optimal utilization across the practice
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Use AI to analyze skills, availability, and project needs to optimize resource allocation and utilization.

templates.name: Care Gap Closure Agent
templates.description: Identifies missing screenings and automates outreach to improve quality scores
templates.shortDescription: Automated care gap identification and closure
templates.businessBenefit: Improves quality scores by 30% and increases preventive care compliance by 45%

userStories: As a care coordinator, I want automated identification of patients needing preventive care
As a patient, I want reminders for important health screenings
As a provider, I want to improve my quality scores
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Deploy AI to identify care gaps and automate patient outreach to improve preventive care compliance and quality scores.

templates.name: Returns & Complaints Resolution Agent
templates.description: Handles common customer issues autonomously
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces customer service costs by 60% and improves satisfaction by 35%

userStories: As a customer, I want quick resolution to my return requests
As a service agent, I want routine complaints handled automatically
As a manager, I want reduced customer service costs
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Implement conversational AI to handle returns and complaints autonomously, escalating only complex cases to human agents.

templates.name: Mission Reporting Assistant
templates.description: Generates reports from classified/unclassified sources to brief leadership quickly
templates.businessBenefit: Reduces report generation time by 85% while maintaining security compliance

userStories: As a commander, I want rapid synthesis of mission-critical information
As an analyst, I want automated report generation from multiple sources
As an operator, I want secure access to relevant intelligence
defaultConfiguration.generalStrategy: Deploy secure, AI-powered report generation that aggregates classified and unclassified sources while maintaining strict security compliance.
